How to install:
1. Run Amazing Adventures 3 The Caribbean Secret_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Sunken treasure must be found in Amazing Adventures The Caribbean Secret! Legend has it that a Spanish ship loaded with a fortune of gold went missing somewhere in the Caribbean and was never found. Explore 25 amazing Caribbean locations, finding over 2000 cleverly hidden objects and playing 8 unique mini-games to recover hidden treasure. Amazing Adventures The Caribbean Secret features tons of mini-games, including match 3, word search, jigsaw puzzles and more. Good luck adventurer!
